/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling life that thrives beyond the frame of the image. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive backdrop.
